summary: A group of masterless samurai living in Edo's red light district must fend off a militia bent on wiping out local prostitutes.
cast: Yoshio Harada|Kanako Higuchi|Renji Ishibashi|Kaoru Sugita|Hiroko Isayama|Takuya Fujisaki|Moeko Ezawa|Tatsu Nakamura|Manko Kurenai|Yukie Kagawa|Fumiaki Tonamiyama|Takashi Tsumura|Takuji Aoki|Hideyo Amamoto|Mami Kaneko|Noriko Murai|Keiko Mikasa|Akiko Matsumura|Katsura Wada|Satoko Yamamura|Keiji Yoshioka|Michihiro Kai|Takaya Kuroda|Daiki Nakamura|Hisashi Kimura|Naomi Kobayashi|Masashi Furuta|Satoru Hosokawa|Kengo Yoshiwara|Yasushi Hirai|Yûtarô Ban|Katsuhito Matsuo|Toshiaki Kusunoki|Katsuhiko Sunaga|Jyôwa Morihashi|Akio Kobune|Kazutaka Shima|Masaru Makino|Yoshimitsu Takada|Tomohiro Yoshikawa|Shôhei Matsubara|Motohiro Toriki|Sachi Kamakura|Sanae Kitahara|Eiko Akashi|Kyoko Imamura|Yoshimi Suzuki|Yôko Moriei|Masako Ogura|Mohei Kusai|Michitarô Mizushima|Akira Nakao|Kei Satô|Hiroyuki Nagato|Kunie Tanaka|Shintarô Katsu
title: Rônin-gai
